page.title: 17UTILITIES, BURSTON AREA
page.content: ELECTRICITY All Farms MAINS WATER 6 Farms. l has a borehole for cattle BOREHOLES Hardiwick Farm - reservoir and borehole supplying;Romer,Shruggs,Hill,Kiplass, Grove farms and 6 cottages Smallrice Farm - reservoir and borehole supplying Little Smallrice Sandy Leys farms and cottages 7 farms have own boreholes SEWAGE l farm with main drains 20 septic tanks l farm - buildings away from house - slurry pit only Burston cottages-sewage emptied by County Council weekly GAS No gas piped to farms or village
